text: Yılmaz Gökdel (20 February 1940 – 4 November 2019) was a Turkish football midfielder and later manager. He was capped 5 times for Turkey, and also managed the national team. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Turkish footballers Category:Sarıyer S.K. footballers Category:Beykozspor footballers Category:Galatasaray S.K. footballers Category:Vefa S.K. footballers Category:Turkey international footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Turkish football managers Category:Galatasaray S.K. title: Yılmaz Gökdel
